languages.text: Any of the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks and {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} of all the enemies hit by −8% until the end of combat. Does not stack.
languages.original_text: Все атаки {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g} и атаки {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}рукопашным{/g} оружием {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}по области{/g}, совершаемые архмилитантом, снижают шанс {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g} на 8% у всех противников, получивших попадание, до конца боя. Эффект не суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Any burst attacks and melee area attacks of the Veteran reduce dodge of all the enemies hit by −15% until the end of combat. Does not stack.
Any of the Veteran's burst attacks and melee area attacks reduce dodge of all the enemies hit by −15% until the end of combat. Does not stack.

Does not stack.

languages.text: 首席战士所有{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}射击与{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}，都会使所有被命中敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}降低8%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果不可叠加。
languages.original_text: Any of the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks and {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} of all the enemies hit by −8% until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 老兵所有{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}连发{/g}射击与近战范围攻击，都会使所有被{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}降低15%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果不可叠加。

languages.text: Cualquier ataque de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g} o de {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}área{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del Archimilitante reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} de todos los enemigos que reciban un impacto un −8 % hasta el final del combate. Este efecto no es acumulativo.

languages.text: アーク・ミリタントが{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}攻撃および{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}を繰り出すと、戦闘終了までヒットしたすべての敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}が−8%減少する。この効果はスタックしない。

traits.locale_text: Все атаки {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}очередью{/g} и атаки рукопашным оружием по области, совершаемые ветераном, снижают шанс {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонения{/g} на 15% у всех противников, получивших{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g}, до конца боя. Эффект не суммируется.

languages.text: Alle {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salvenangriffe{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} des Erzmilitanten reduzieren bis zum Ende des Kampfes {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} bei sämtlichen getroffenen Feinden um −8 %. languages.text: Toutes les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}en rafale{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} de l'archimilitant réduisent l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} de l'ensemble des ennemis touchés de −8 % jusqu'à la fin du combat. traits.locale_text: Toutes les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}en rafale{/g} et attaques de zone en mêlée du Vétéran réduisent l'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} de l'ensemble des ennemis {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touchés{/g} de -15 % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Non cumulable.

languages.text: Başmilitan'ın her türlü {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}seri saldırıları{/g} ile {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırıları{/g}, tüm düşmanların {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değerlerini %8 azaltır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikmez.
